equipment: beamline i11 at the Diamond Light Source
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Isostructural with [Ni(pyz)2(SiF6)]n, SIFSIX-3-Ni. Stability to 533 K. Minor decreases in unit cell volumes upon desolvation: 2.9% and 1.8% for SIFSIX-17-Ni and TIFSIX-17-Ni, respectively.

synthesis_conditions.notes: Reported in 2018 and studied for propyne/propylene separation but remains unexplored with respect to C2 and CO2 gas sorption.
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Isostructural with its pyz based analogue, [Ni(pyz)2(SiF6)]n, SIFSIX-3-Ni. Minor decreases in unit cell volumes upon desolvation: 2.9% and 1.8% for SIFSIX-17-Ni and TIFSIX-17-Ni, respectively.
